text:
Can't speak more highly of the hockey coaches at Maruti. They are dedicated, motivated, inspirational and true role models for the kids. Both my son and daughter keenly enjoy their weekly hockey sessions and eagerly look forward to them.

My daughter was recently crestfallen because she didn't have sufficient fellow girl players in the same age group to form a team for Pesta Sukan. Coaches Vijayan and Rege went the extra mile, reached out to their network and convinced another team  to accommodate her. She is thrilled and incredibly grateful to them! It shows their genuine commitment to the sport and their overarching desire to give each child the opportunity to participate and excel.

Cheers,
Shivram

My boy Ari has been with the Academy from the age of 6. It has not only turned him into a good hockey player but has also played a part in his personal development as a confident and disciplined teenager.
We admire the dedication and commitment of coaches from Maruti Hockey Academy and can attest to how much our kids benefit from being a part of this team!
Love how they have age appropriate sessions for my kids. Done wonders for my childrenâ€™s psychomotor skills.
